mapper.sql: detail_info_id, account_id, account_label, id_code, account_name, school_name, inschool_time, education, is_credit, company_name, work_prov_name, work_city_name, work_city_area_name, work_address, live_address, work_age, work_income, work_income_prove, is_host_gjj, is_host_sb, is_host_house, is_host_car, loan_quota, loan_time_limit, create_time, update_time, state, remark1, remark2, remark3, income_situation, email, if_marriage, font_pic, back_pic, face_pic, face_token
mapper.select: select detail_info_id, account_id, account_label, id_code, account_name, school_name, inschool_time, education, is_credit, company_name, work_prov_name, work_city_name, work_city_area_name, work_address, live_address, work_age, work_income, work_income_prove, is_host_gjj as qizhaNum,is_host_sb as IsNotLink,is_host_house as riskCode, is_host_car as zhimaNum, loan_quota as zhimaPfen, loan_time_limit, create_time, update_time, state, remark1, remark2, remark3, income_situation, email, if_marriage, font_pic, back_pic, face_pic, face_token from account_detail_info where detail_info_id = #{arg0}

select detail_info_id, account_id, account_label, id_code, account_name, school_name, inschool_time, education, is_credit, company_name, work_prov_name, work_city_name, work_city_area_name, work_address, live_address, work_age, work_income, work_income_prove, is_host_gjj as qizhaNum,is_host_sb as IsNotLink,is_host_house as riskCode, is_host_car as zhimaNum, loan_quota as zhimaPfen, loan_time_limit, create_time, update_time, state, remark1, remark2, remark3, income_situation, email, if_marriage, font_pic, back_pic, face_pic, face_token, is_host_gjj AS accountMZhu, is_host_sb AS accountAdress, is_host_sb AS accountPingFen, is_host_sb AS accountZhengJIE from account_detail_info where detail_info_id = #{arg0}
select count(account_id) from account_detail_info where 1=1 and account_name = #{accountName}

select
from account_detail_info where 1=1 and account_name = #{accountName} order by create_time desc

SELECT is_host_gjj as qizhaNum,is_host_sb as IsNotLink,is_host_house as riskCode, is_host_car as zhimaNum, loan_quota as zhimaPfen FROM account_detail_info WHERE account_detail_info.`detail_info_id` IN
#{item}

SELECT is_host_gjj AS accountMZhu, is_host_sb AS accountAdress, is_host_sb AS accountPingFen, is_host_sb AS accountZhengJIE FROM account_detail_info WHERE account_detail_info.`detail_info_id` IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
update account_detail_info
account_id = #{accountId},
account_label = #{accountLabel},
id_code = #{idCode},
account_name = #{accountName},
school_name = #{schoolName},
inschool_time = #{inschoolTime},
education = #{education},
is_credit = #{isCredit},
company_name = #{companyName},
work_prov_name = #{workProvName},
work_city_name = #{workCityName},
work_city_area_name = #{workCityAreaName},
work_address = #{workAddress},
live_address = #{liveAddress},
work_age = #{workAge},
work_income = #{workIncome},
work_income_prove = #{workIncomeProve},
is_host_gjj = #{isHostGjj},
is_host_sb = #{isHostSb},
is_host_house = #{isHostHouse},
is_host_car = #{isHostCar},
loan_quota = #{loanQuota},
loan_time_limit = #{loanTimeLimit},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
state = #{state},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
remark3 = #{remark3},
income_situation = #{incomeSituation},
email = #{email},
if_marriage = #{ifMarriage},
font_pic = #{fontPic},
back_pic = #{backPic},
face_pic = #{facePic},
face_token = #{faceToken},
where detail_info_id = #{detailInfoId}
